entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Iron Marines: RTS offline game
entry.summary:
Hero Dr.Graff: $4.99 â†’ $2.99
Hero Blue Dragon: $6.99 â†’ $4.99
Hero Sha'Tra: $4.99 â†’ $2.99
Hero Ajax: $2.99 â†’ $0.99
Hero Mark X: $6.99 â†’ $4.99
Hero Fate: $2.99 â†’ $0.99
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Hero Dr.Graffï¼š$4.99 â†’ $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]
  • Hero Blue Dragonï¼š$6.99 â†’ $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $6.99]
  • Hero Sha'Traï¼š$4.99 â†’ $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]
  • Hero Ajaxï¼š$2.99 â†’ $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]
  • Hero Mark Xï¼š$6.99 â†’ $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $6.99]
  • Hero Fateï¼š$2.99 â†’ $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]

Application Description

From the creators of the award winner, Kingdom Rush saga comes the most extraordinary space odyssey. Fight challenging real time strategy sci fi battles on amazing and unknown planets. Command brave soldiers, mighty mechas and powerful aliens against hordes of space monsters, swarms of insectoids and robot armies in a galaxy far far away. PLAN, ATTACK AND BEAT ALL THE ENEMIES ADAPTING YOUR STRATEGY by changing the role of your troops even in the thick of the combat, from ranger to sniper, from flamethrowers to missile launchers. ADAPT YOUR STRATEGY by changing the role of your troops even in the thick of battle, from ranger to sniper, from flamethrowers to missile launchers. RECRUIT AND TRAIN THE GREATEST HEROES in the galaxy, lead them into dangerous territory against near-impossible odds and unleash their mighty powers and abilities. TURN THE TIDE OF BATTLE with orbital strikes, intelligent mines, support troops, turrets and a wide array of special weapons. Armies of robots, crushed starships, gigantic monsters, unknown races, brave assaults, desperate rescues, audacious sabotages... the galaxy needs your command. The galaxy needs the Iron Marines FEATURES â€¢ 21 CAMPAIGN MISSIONS across three sci fi planets. Each action-packed challenge will have you improve your strategy to save the galaxy! â€¢ 17 SPECIAL OPERATIONS that will test if you have what it takes to battle your way through space. â€¢ 40+ UPGRADES to build the ultimate RTS army! Choose between Defense Drones, Napalm Rockets, Ricocheting Blasts, Lethal Weapons and many more. â€¢ +7 UNITS to bring into battle and give your hero some extra firepower! â€¢ 8 SPECIAL WEAPONS to unleash hell on your enemies and keep expanding your tactics like space itself! Whatâ€™s better than a well-placed missile? An orbital strike of 50 high-explosive missiles! â€¢ DEFEAT UNIQUE BOSSES in epic battles. They are green, mean, killing machines!!! Wellâ€¦ some are machines and these aliens arenâ€™t greenâ€¦ but theyâ€™re all massive and determined to crush you. Suit up, Marines! â€¢ 70+ ACHIEVEMENTS to complete and show everyone youâ€™re the best RTS commander in the whole galaxy! â€¢ NO WI-FI IN SPACE? No worries, offline play guaranteed! â€¢ CHOOSE YOUR DIFFICULTY MODE: Casual, Normal or Veteran. Donâ€™t get cocky! Or Do! Your choice! â€¢ IMPOSSIBLE MODE. Only for the most daring, reckless, all-out-of-bubblegum marines in space. We dare you!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: RadarOmega
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Data Level Betaï¼š$89.99 â†’ $8.99 [$8.99 ~ $89.99]

Application Description

Welcome to RadarOmega, the next-generation weather app that takes high-resolution weather data to a whole new level. More than just radar, RadarOmega provides unique data solutions for all types of weather data that are customizable depending on your needs, whether that's before, during, or after the storm. Dedicated to providing solutions to our industry, RadarOmega created an exclusive network of weather stations featuring live video and sensor data called cyclonePORT. RadarOmega and cyclonePORT work closely with universities, emergency managers, broadcast meteorologists, and more to provide solutions for relaying critical weather information when life-threatening weather situations are imminent. RadarOmega provides high-resolution radar data for the United States, Canada, Germany, Australia, and South Korea. Base Application -NEW Warning Display Dialog -NEW Hi-Res Storm Relative Velocity -MRMS Reflectivity -Hi-Res Single Site Radar Data -30 Frames of Data -7 Day Radar History -Lightning Detection/Animation -24 Hour Storm Reports -SPC Convective Outlooks & Watches -NHC Tropical Suite & Hurricane Hunter -WPC Excessive Rainfall Outlooks -Mesoscale Discussions (Severe, Winter, & Precip.) -CPC Temp. & Precip. Outlooks -Fire Weather Outlooks & Drought Monitor -WPC Winter Forecasts & WSSI -METARS -Real-Time NWS Storm-Based Warnings -Non-Precip Watches/Warnings for USA -Flash Animation & In-App Sound Alert for All Alerts -WPC Surface Analysis -Buoy Data & Tide Forecasts -NEXRAD Hail History -Spotter Network Locations -Power Outage Layer -Map Type Customization -Detailed City & Road Network -15 Custom Locations with a Linked RadarOmega Account -Drawing, Data Viewer, & Distance Tools -Storm Track Drawing Tool -Share Screenshot & Video -Push Notifications for All Storm-Based Watches/Warnings Using GPS Location -Access to cyclonePORT Network Gamma -Hi-Res Satellite Data -Lightning Detection/Animation, METARS, & GLM for Mesoscale & Storm-Based Satellite Sectors -National Digital Forecast Database -Access to Project MesoVort -75 Frames of Data -Dual View Radar with 30 Frames -Smoothing for Radar/Satellite -30 Day Radar History -6 Month Storm Report Archive -3D Radar/Satellite -Upload 3 Custom Color Tables -30 Custom Locations with Icon Upload -2 Custom Location Lists -Push Notifications Open to All Weather Alerts Using GPS Location ONLY (max of 8 at a time) Beta *Everything in Gamma PLUS* -MRMS Data -150 Frames of Data -Dual View Radar/Satellite with 50 Frames -Smoothing for MRMS -90 Day Radar History -5 Year Storm Report Archive -3D MRMS -Upload 8 Custom Color Tables -75 Custom Locations with Icon Upload -5 Custom Location Lists Alpha *Everything in Beta PLUS* -Volumetric Radar -Model Data with Contours for HRRR, NAM3KM, NAM12KM, RAP, GFS, ECMWF, HWRF, & HMON -250 Frames of Data -Dual View Radar/Satellite with 100 Frames -Quad View Radar/Satellite on iPad & Desktop with 50 Frames -Smoothing for Models -90 Day Radar History -10 Year Storm Report Archive -Upload 30 Custom Color Tables -150 Custom Locations with Icon Upload -10 Custom Location Lists -1 Site Lightning Monitoring with Custom Range Zones -Push Notifications Open to All Weather Alerts for up to 3 Custom Locations and GPS Locations (max of 8 at a time) Additional Add-Ons -Rapid Sweep Subscriptions are maintained through the iOS App Store. We will work with our customers however, refunds must be done through the iOS App Store. Please be sure to reach out to our support team if you have any problems, questions, or concerns. For Support- You can create a ticket and we will resolve it as soon as possible: https://radaromegawx.supportbee.io/portal/sign_in See our Terms of Service below: https://www.radaromega.com/terms.php

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Ghostly Detector
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$0.99 â†’ Free [Free ~ $1.19]ï¼‰

Application Description

This app has a simple functionality: detecting the presence of spirits and capturing them. Once captured, it displays the Six Syllable Mantra from Eastern Buddhism as a form of protection and blessing for the user. â€¢ This application might scare you. â€¢ All sensors are on one page. â€¢ A real radar to track anomalies. â€¢ Highly accurate EMF (Electromagnetic Field) detector. â€¢ Take photos and detect anomalies within - can be freely turned on or off. â€¢ More detailed instructions are available in the app; simply touch the ? button to access them. Warning: If you are a very sensitive or easily scared individual, please consider not using this app and turning it off. Do not put yourself in danger while using this app. If you believe you are in danger, please close the app, contact someone for help, and leave the area immediately. Disclaimer: Please remember that we cannot guarantee the accuracy of any ghost detection since the app uses different sensors of the device, and thus it greatly depends on the terminal's precision and quality. Since supernatural activities cannot be scientifically proven, we cannot guarantee that the app communicates with real spirits. The results of this app cannot be scientifically verified.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Hitman Sniper
entry.summary:
Extra Large Money Pack: $9.99 â†’ $7.99
Starter Pack: $4.99 â†’ $2.99
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Extra Large Money Packï¼š$9.99 â†’ $7.99 [$7.99 ~ $9.99]
  • Starter Packï¼š$4.99 â†’ $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]

Application Description

BECOME THE ULTIMATE SILENT ASSASSIN Step into the shoes of Agent 47 in Hitman: Sniper and discover the most compelling sniper experience on mobile. TACTICAL MISSIONS IN MONTENEGRO Hone your strategic skills and orchestrate the perfect assassination. ACTION ZOMBIE CHALLENGE IN DEATH VALLEY Prepare for non-stop action in a true test of your accuracy and speed of execution. MORE THAN 150 MISSIONS AND 11 DIFFERENT CONTRACTS Improve your strategy for the perfect assassination as you uncover secrets and subterfuges. 17 UNIQUE WEAPONS Eliminate targets, collect weapon parts and complete blueprints to unlock the most powerful rifles. COMPETE AGAINST YOUR FRIENDS TO DOMINATE THE LEADERBOARD Boost your score and climb up the ranks to become the world's finest silent assassin. Hitman: Sniper is memory intensive. Devices such as iPad 2, iPad Mini, iPhone 4S and iPod Touch 5th Generation will suffer from occasional dips in performance and will not support Everyplay.

entry.title: Vostok â€” Story Maker
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$0.49 â†’ $0.29 [Free ~ $0.99]ï¼‰

Application Description

Welcome to Vostok â€“ your ultimate companion for crafting captivating stories and stunning collages, designed to elevate your social media presence! With Vostok, transforming your ideas into professional-grade posts and stories is now a breeze. Whether you're a blogger, photographer, or simply love sharing your life's moments on social media, Vostok provides all the tools you need to create content that will make an impact. Our sleek and user-friendly app seamlessly combines your passion for photography and storytelling, offering a dynamic platform to showcase your awe-inspiring moments. Embracing a minimalist style, Vostok becomes your canvas for unlimited creativity. A vast collection of templates, stickers, and effects empowers you to design unique stories that reflect your individuality. But Vostok goes beyond creative freedom; it's all about simplicity. Our intuitive interface makes editing and sharing your content effortless, freeing up more time for you to focus on crafting compelling narratives that your followers will adore. No more waiting! Embark on your Vostok journey today and craft captivating posts and stories that leave a lasting impression! Here's a glimpse of some of our features: Â· 200+ design templates for social media Â· Exclusive fonts with Cyrillic support Â· 450+ unique stickers Â· Atmospheric dust and grain effects for photos Â· Variety of backgrounds: paper textures, marble, gradients, colors Â· Ad-free with no subscription requirements Â· Dark mode compatibility Recognized as one of the Best Apps of 2019 by Apple. With over 200+ templates, Vostok is your go-to toolkit for creating standout social media content. We eagerly look forward to your ideas and feedback. Connect with us at hello@vostokapp.ru or drop us a direct message on Instagram at @vostokapp.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • æ°¸ä¹…ä¼šå‘˜ï¼š$14.99 â†’ $12.99 [$12.99 ~ $19.99]

Application Description

è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾å…³äºç”Ÿã€æ­»ã€å¿ƒæ„¿ä¸å»¶ç»­çš„Appã€‚ å°æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¥ä¸ºè‡ªå·±æ˜¯ä¸ä¼šè€å»çš„å½¼å¾—Â·æ½˜ï¼Œå´ç»ˆç©¶æ•Œä¸è¿‡å¥åº·ç£¨æŸï¼Œå®¹é¢œè€å»ã€‚ æ—¶é’ˆè½¬åŠ¨ï¼Œç”Ÿå‘½æµé€ï¼Œä½†æ¯ä¸€æ¬¡å¿ƒè·³éƒ½å¯ä»¥æ›´åŠ æœ‰åŠ›ã€‚ æœ‰æ—¶å€™ï¼Œç”Ÿå‘½åªæ˜¯ä¸€è¿ä¸²çš„æ•°å­—ï¼Œå¤šå°‘å¹´ï¼Œå¤šå°‘æœˆï¼Œå¤šå°‘å°æ—¶ï¼Œå¤šå°‘åˆ†é’Ÿã€‚å½“ä½ æ„è¯†åˆ°è¿™ä¸ªæ—¶ï¼Œå¾€å¾€é™·å…¥å·¨å¤§çš„è™šæ— æ„Ÿä¹‹ä¸­ï¼Œæƒ¶æä¸èƒ½è‡ªæ‹”ã€‚ è€Œç°åœ¨ï¼Œè¿™äº›æ•°å­—å¯ä»¥æˆä¸ºä½ é‡å¡‘ç”Ÿå‘½çš„åæ ‡ï¼ŒæŒ‡å¼•ä½ èµ°å‘æ›´å¥åº·ã€æ›´é•¿ä¹…çš„æœªæ¥ã€‚ ç”Ÿè¾° 2.0 é€šè¿‡ AI åˆ†æå’Œç§‘å­¦åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œä¸ä»…é¢„æµ‹ç”Ÿå‘½çš„ç»ˆç‚¹ï¼Œæ›´ä¸ºä½ é“ºå°±å»¶é•¿ç”Ÿå‘½çš„é“è·¯ï¼š - æ¢ç´¢ä½ çš„ç”Ÿå‘½æ—¶é’Ÿï¼šäº†è§£å½“ä¸‹çš„é¢„æœŸå¯¿å‘½ï¼Œç›´é¢ç”Ÿå‘½çš„æœ‰é™ä¸çè´µã€‚ - å‘ç°å»¶å¯¿çš„å¯èƒ½ï¼šçœ‹è§æ”¹å˜å¥åº·ä¹ æƒ¯èƒ½ä¸ºä½ å¸¦æ¥å¤šå°‘é¢å¤–çš„ç”Ÿå‘½æ—¶å…‰ã€‚ - èšåˆå¥åº·æ•°æ®ï¼šè‡ªåŠ¨è¿½è¸ªç¡çœ ã€é”»ç‚¼ã€å‹åŠ›ï¼ˆHRVï¼‰ã€ç»æœŸã€å–æ°´ç­‰åä½™ç§å¥åº·æ•°æ® ç¾å›½è¯—äººçº³Â·æ–¯å¾…å°”åœ¨87å²é‚£å¹´å†™é“ï¼š "å¦‚æœæˆ‘èƒ½å¤Ÿä»å¤´æ´»è¿‡ï¼Œæˆ‘ä¼šè¯•ç€çŠ¯æ›´å¤šçš„é”™ã€‚ æˆ‘ä¼šæ”¾æ¾ä¸€ç‚¹ï¼Œæˆ‘ä¼šçµæ´»ä¸€ç‚¹ã€‚ æˆ‘ä¼šçˆ¬æ›´å¤šçš„å±±ï¼Œæ¸¸æ›´å¤šçš„æ²³ï¼Œçœ‹æ›´å¤šçš„æ—¥è½ã€‚" å› ä¸ºäº†è§£ç”Ÿå‘½çš„ç»ˆç‚¹ï¼Œæ‰èƒ½æ›´å¥½åœ°çæƒœå½“ä¸‹çš„æ¯ä¸€åˆ»ã€‚ç”Ÿè¾°2.0 æ¢ç´¢å¥åº·çš„å¯èƒ½ï¼Œè®©æˆ‘ä»¬æˆä¸ºä½ å¥åº·æ—…ç¨‹çš„é•¿ä¹…ä¼™ä¼´ã€‚ ã€ç”Ÿè¾° App ä¼šå‘˜æœåŠ¡è¯´æ˜ã€‘ 1.ä¼šå‘˜åŒ…å«å‡ ç§è®¢è´­ç±»å‹ è®¢é˜…å‘¨æœŸï¼š1ä¸ªæœˆã€3ä¸ªæœˆã€12ä¸ªæœˆ 2.é¦–æ¬¡è®¢è´­åä¼šé€šè¿‡iTunesè´¦æˆ·ç›´æ¥æ”¯ä»˜ï¼›è´¦æˆ·ä¼šåœ¨åˆ°æœŸå‰24å°æ—¶å†…æ‰£è´¹ï¼Œæ‰£è´¹æˆåŠŸåè‡ªåŠ¨é¡ºå»¶ä¸€ä¸ªè®¢é˜…å‘¨æœŸ 3.æœ¬æœåŠ¡ç”±æ‚¨è‡ªä¸»é€‰æ‹©æ˜¯å¦ç»­è®¢ï¼Œå¦‚éœ€å–æ¶ˆï¼Œè¯·åœ¨è®¢é˜…åˆ°æœŸ24å°æ—¶å‰ï¼Œåœ¨ AppleID è®¾ç½®ä¸­å–æ¶ˆ 4.ç”Ÿè¾°App ä¼šå‘˜åè®® ç”Ÿè¾°App ä¼šå‘˜æœåŠ¡åè®®ï¼šhttps://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/ 5.ç”Ÿè¾°App è½¯ä»¶åè®®ä¸éšç§æ”¿ç­– ç”Ÿè¾° è½¯ä»¶è®¸å¯åŠæœåŠ¡åè®®ï¼šhttps://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/ ç”Ÿè¾° éšç§åè®®ï¼šhttps://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

entry.title: Goodnotes 6: AI Notes & Docs
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Marketplace Contentï¼š$6.99 â†’ $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $10.99)]

Application Description

Ever wish your notes could do more? With Goodnotes 6, they can! Step into the future of note-taking with Goodnotes 6, the best AI notebook for iPad. Write notes, convert handwriting to text, annotate PDFs, and use AI tools for study and productivity. Boost Professional Efficiency and Productivity â€¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to summarize, translate, and extract key insights from your notes, PDFs, and documentsâ€”perfect for your next important meeting. â€¢ Import, annotate, and organize PDFs, documents, and meeting notes. â€¢ Transcribe audio recordings from meetings so you never miss a detail. â€¢ Present like a pro, with a built-in laser pointer that is perfect for meetings and presentations. â€¢ Export and share notes via email, print, PDF, or images for easy collaboration. â€¢ Send files directly to your unique Goodnotes email for quick access on all devices. â€¢ New pen gestures like Scribble to Erase let you erase by scribbling, while Circle to Select helps you quickly select and edit notesâ€”all without switching tools. â€¢ Convert handwriting to text for quick and clean professional notes. â€¢ Sync your notes across all devices with cloud sync through iCloud, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, and WebDAV. Powerful Digital Notes and Study Tools â€¢ Use AI-powered study tools help you learn faster and retain more information. â€¢ Use Ask Goodnotes to generate practice quizzes, summarize text, or answer questions, directly from your handwriting. â€¢ Powered by our in-house AI technology, Math Assist, converts handwriting to text on iPad and solves handwritten equations instantly. â€¢ Convert equations to LaTeX format for easy use in reports and presentations. â€¢ Memorize vocabulary and key concepts with AI-powered Study Sets using active recall and spaced repetition. â€¢ No more flipping through pages: Handwriting search makes all your notes instantly searchable, even handwritten ones. â€¢ Collaborate in real time with classmates by working on the same document for group projects and study sessions â€¢ Record audio with live transcription while taking notes, so you never miss a detail. Easily edit, search, and remove text from the transcript to review key points faster. Enhance Creative Digital Planning â€¢ Design fully customizable notebooks, templates, and covers to fit your style. â€¢ Mix handwriting, text, stickers, images, and drawings in a single notebook. â€¢ Stay focused with Smart Timer, and boost your productivity. â€¢ Browse the in-app Marketplace for stickers, washi tape patterns, as well as stylish templates, educational materials, and planners. â€¢ Organize your notes with unlimited folders and advanced search. â€¢ Get exclusive monthly downloads every month with a paid subscription. â€¢ Use creative tools like pencil, tape, lasso tool, layering, eyedropper, and image cropping to make your planner truly yours. Experience the best AI note app for students, professionals, and planners. Join millions of users who have transformed their workflow with Goodnotes 6, the best note-taking app for iPad. Download Goodnotes 6 for free and create your first notebook today. Website: www.goodnotes.com X: @goodnotesapp Instagram: @goodnotes.app Pinterest: @goodnotesapp TikTok: @goodnotesapp Privacy policy: https://www.goodnotes.com/privacy-policy Terms and Conditions: https://www.goodnotes.com/terms-and-conditions

entry.title: Ticket to RideÂ® The Board Game
entry.id: Ticket to RideÂ® The Board Game-1746847016133
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$4.99 â†’ $2.99 ($2.99 ~ $4.99)ï¼‰

Application Description

Play the ultimate digital version of the multi-award-winning modern classic board game Ticket to Ride! Journey across various countries, connecting their vibrant cities and exploring their unique gameplay mechanics and bonuses on the way. Ticket to Ride offers a variety of game modes to suit you. Want to get competitive? Head online to challenge other players around the world and climb the leaderboards, or play with friends further afield in a private game. Got a packed schedule? Set up or join an asynchronous game and play across multiple days â€“ weâ€™ll notify you when it is your turn, so you can go at your own pace. Test out new strategies or keep it casual in single-player mode against state-of-the-art AI opponents. You can even make a game night of it with friends and family in couch play! Get to know a cast of unforgettable characters, each bringing their own tales to the table. Add new locomotives and carriages to your fleet with every expansion, and cement your name in railway history on the leaderboard! Become a railway legend in the iconic, fan-favourite modern classic! HOW TO PLAY TICKET TO RIDEÂ®: Players are dealt a number of tickets and must pick a certain number to keep (depending on the map). Players are also dealt four train cards of various colours. This number can also vary depending on the map youâ€™re playing on, but donâ€™t worry â€“ the AI takes care of this! Each turn, players can draw two train cards from the face-up pile, draw two train cards from the face-down pile, draw another ticket to complete, or use their train cards to claim a route! A claimed route is shown by placing train pieces along the route. When a player has three or fewer train pieces left, the last round starts. Whoever has the most points at the end of the game is the winner! FEATURES A TRULY SOCIAL TAKE ON MULTIPLAYER â€“ Play online with friends or enjoy a seamless matchmaking experience when you challenge players from around the world. Alternatively, take on your friend sitting right next to you in couch play â€“ use the free Ticket to Ride companion app to really boost your couch gaming session! PLAY AROUND YOUR BUSY DAY â€“ Set up a game in async mode and play a game across multiple days. SINGLE-PLAYER MODE DRIVEN BY EXPERT AIs â€“ Powered by an innovative adaptive AI system, single-player mode offers a challenge for new and experienced players alike. AN IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE â€“ Every moment has been brought to life with beautiful graphics that will immerse you in the adventure. STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY â€“ Every game presents fresh challenges, and itâ€™s your mission to work out the most efficient solutions. Collect points by completing tickets, linking destinations and building the longest route.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Classic Maze Game for Watch
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$0.99 â†’ Free (Free ~ $0.99)ï¼‰

Application Description

Classic Maze game is a classic puzzle game, perfect for training your brain during a short break. It is designed as a very simple single player game played by sliding through fun retro mazes. Play a quick game and challenge 500 mazes to become the maze king.

entry.title: LUCH: Photo Effects & Filters
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$0.59 â†’ $0.29 ($0.29 ~ $0.59)ï¼‰

Application Description

LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters. 20+ HANDMADE FILTERS The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD. FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds. DUST EFFECT Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects. LIGHT LEAKS You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS. BOKEH EFFECT If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects. NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image. You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films. Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users. We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Please email hello@vostokapp.ru or DM us on Instagram at @luchfilmsapp for questions or suggestions.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: BreatheIn: Calm Breathing
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$1.99 â†’ $0.29 ($0.29 ~ $1.99)ï¼‰

Application Description

Feeling overwhelmed by the chaos of life? Find your peace and vitality with BreatheIn, the app that helps you unlock the power of mindful breathing. Rediscover Calm and Energy Deep, mindful breathing is the key to a calm mind and a vibrant body. With BreatheIn, immerse yourself in guided exercises that harmonize your body and mind, leading to true balance and renewal. Expertly Curated Practices We've handpicked and tested each exercise to ensure you get the best. Start your journey toward a healthier, more fulfilled life today! Seamless Apple Health Integration Track your progress effortlesslyâ€”BreatheIn automatically syncs with Apple Health, making it easy to monitor your wellness journey. Explore a Range of Techniques - Square Breathing (4-4-4-4): Regain control and calm your mind. - Relax Breathing (4-7-8): Beat anxiety and fall asleep faster. - Bee Breathing: Soothe your mind with this relaxing technique. - Coherent Breathing: Improve your well-being through HRV enhancement. - Transform Your Life, One Breath at a Time Conquer stress, boost your resilience, and rediscover balance with every breath. Download BreatheIn now and take the first step toward a more vibrant, peaceful you!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Sky Band
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$0.99 â†’ Free (Free ~ $0.99)ï¼‰

Application Description

"Sky Band" is a tool app for composing and practicing music for "Sky: Children of the Light" game players. [Main Feature] 1. Like "Garage Band", quickly compose music. 2. Practice score on different instruments like playing a music game. 3. Share scores between users. [Compose Score] 1. Support recording and playback. 2. Support magnetic adsorption and fine tuning, the minimum unit is 1/64th note. 3. Support metronome, chords, multi-part recording and other advanced features. [Practice Score] 1. Provide three modes: follow mode, free mode, grade mode 2. Support basic features such as scaling the size of the score, count-in, metronome, tempo adjustment, etc 3. Support tonic mode, AB cycle, particle effect and other advanced features.
